Key Match Events: Skubal struck out Ceddanne Rafaela to end the eighth inning with a 99 mph fastball
Tyler O’Neill hit a 25th homerun in the first inning
Trey Sweeney's double led to two runs for the Tigers in the second inning due to poor defense by Rob Refsnyder
Pre-Game Insights: Alex Cora mentioned Tarik Skubal as possibly the best pitcher in the American League
Red Sox had chances to win, especially in the ninth inning against Tigers closer Tyler Holton
Post-Match Reflections: Rob Refsnyder acknowledged missing the catch and apologized to Nick Pivetta
Nick Pivetta executed his pitches well despite allowing two runs
Alex Cora believes the team needs to play better baseball but remains optimistic
Miscellaneous Highlights: Game started at 6:10 PM and lasted 2 hours and 1 minute
Red Sox remain 3½ games out in the race for a wild-card berth
